mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T02_PERSONAL ( FIRST_NAME , LAST_NAME , NO , MOBILE , MAILE , BIRTH_DATE , BIRTH_TIME , SEX , COVER , HEAD_PORTRAIT , VIDEO , INFOMATION , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , REGEDIT_DATE , REGEDIT_TIME , OWNER_ID , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{firstName} , #{lastName} , #{nO} , #{mobile} , #{maile} , #{birthDate} , #{birthTime} , #{sex} , #{cover} , #{headPortrait} , #{video} , #{infomation} , #{latitude} , #{longitude} , #{regeditDate} , #{regeditTime} , #{ownerID} , #{createDate} , #{createTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T02_PERSONAL SET FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} , LAST_NAME = #{lastName} , NO = #{nO} , MOBILE = #{mobile} , MAILE = #{maile} , BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate} , BIRTH_TIME = #{birthTime} , SEX = #{sex} , COVER = #{cover} , HEAD_PORTRAIT = #{headPortrait} , VIDEO = #{video} , INFOMATION = #{infomation} , LATITUDE = #{latitude} , LONGITUDE = #{longitude} , REGEDIT_DATE = #{regeditDate} , REGEDIT_TIME = #{regeditTime} , OWNER_ID = #{ownerID} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "firstName" , LAST_NAME AS "lastName" , NO AS "nO" , MOBILE AS "mobile" , MAILE AS "maile" , BIRTH_DATE AS "birthDate" , BIRTH_TIME AS "birthTime" , SEX AS "sex" , COVER AS "cover" , HEAD_PORTRAIT AS "headPortrait" , VIDEO AS "video" , INFOMATION AS "infomation" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , REGEDIT_DATE AS "regeditDate" , REGEDIT_TIME AS "regeditTime" , OWNER_ID AS "ownerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T02_PERSONAL WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "firstName" , LAST_NAME AS "lastName" , NO AS "nO" , MOBILE AS "mobile" , MAILE AS "maile" , BIRTH_DATE AS "birthDate" , BIRTH_TIME AS "birthTime" , SEX AS "sex" , COVER AS "cover" , HEAD_PORTRAIT AS "headPortrait" , VIDEO AS "video" , INFOMATION AS "infomation" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , REGEDIT_DATE AS "regeditDate" , REGEDIT_TIME AS "regeditTime" , OWNER_ID AS "ownerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T02_PERSONAL WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "firstName" , LAST_NAME AS "lastName" , NO AS "nO" , MOBILE AS "mobile" , MAILE AS "maile" , BIRTH_DATE AS "birthDate" , BIRTH_TIME AS "birthTime" , SEX AS "sex" , COVER AS "cover" , HEAD_PORTRAIT AS "headPortrait" , VIDEO AS "video" , INFOMATION AS "infomation" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , REGEDIT_DATE AS "regeditDate" , REGEDIT_TIME AS "regeditTime" , OWNER_ID AS "ownerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T02_PERSONAL WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
